clusterList.phrase: the king's heart is in the hand of the lord as the rivers of water he turneth it whithersoever he will
mark how he has described at once both the water and the cross

the river david talks about was not a flowing stream but a dry gulch a wadi the spiritual man does not need constantly flowing water in order to prosper he prospers even when the skies are cloudless and the land parched because his roots on the upstream side of the dyke
where is god's hand with the loss of a home or life how to explain flood waters it's hard to express what is going on
